title.rendered: Eldorado Stone® Presents New Moonlight Roughcut™

content.rendered:
Possessing a rich architectural history that spans the late 19th and early 20th centuries, limestone, with its rugged lines and textured appeal, is a universal element characteristic to European and American structural design. Masons often strengthened limestone’s natural appeal by hand-dressing and chiseling the stone into an ashlar shape with deeply worn edges. Now, the same coarsely cleaved appearance is available in the Eldorado Stone Moonlight RoughCut profile.

 

Download Press Release
